name: 10-sec pause mania (Ludum Dare version)
description:
You are here to push crystals on specific spots for future plans, but there is a Eldrich horror 10 second timer watching every moves you make and cause chaos to the crystals ! Can you counter it ?

The first Ludum Dare game I made. Now I know that days where I have school is the worst days for a game jam game. It was 23 hours (11 pm) when I published the game.
You can rate it if you have a Ludum Dare account, just click on the virus at the top of the page.

Source code :

https://clementsparrow.github.io/Pattern-Script/src/editor.html?hack=8eb2ef54ee3ae92bd0498ceebcc1d8f8

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to wait
Z to undo, R to restart
